attributes.action: ensure that a member of the Government (preferably senior) is present when the bodies of our fallen soldiers are flown home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgraceful that no-one from the Government takes the trouble to be at the airport when our soldiers are brought home. I do not accept that it cannot be done. Can no-one have the decency to show these brave men/women the respect they deserve, after paying the ultimate price for their bravery?
